forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 18C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 65F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 67F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. S winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 62F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. SE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 62F. SE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 18C. S winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
